channel.title: RSS Aggregator Feed
channel.description: An aggregated feed of Technology-related news

item.title: Quels sont les meilleurs écrans PC Ultrawide 21/9 et 32/9 en 2025 ? Le comparatif
item.description: Si vous êtes à la recherche d’un écran gaming très large ou d'une vaste interface pour le travail, vous êtes au bon endroit. Découvrez notre sélection des meilleurs écrans ultrawide.

item.title: À peine 20 € pour cette batterie externe MagSafe certifiée Qi2 10 000 mAh, c’est le super deal du jour
item.description: Cette batterie externe Baseus AirPow II est conçue pour une charge rapide filaire ou sans-fil que vous retrouvez pour 22,39 euros sur Amazon au lieu de 31,99 euros.

item.title: The CZUR ET24 Pro isn’t a perfect book scanner, but those who need one don’t have many choices
item.description: The CZUR ET24 Pro is a scanner designed to efficiently capture books up to A3 in size.

item.title: Behold: A Transformer That Turns Into a Working Bluetooth Speaker and Tape Deck
item.description: It is my pleasure to welcome Robosen's Soundwave.

item.title: Sam Altman Wants His Own Rocket Company
item.description: The OpenAI CEO explored a deal with Stoke Space that would have put him in control of the rocket startup.

item.title: Amazon is reportedly ready to drop its USPS deal if negotiations fall through
item.description: After over 30 years, Amazon may be cutting ties with the United States Postal Service as it looks to expand its own delivery network, as reported by The Washington Post. The outlet, owned by Amazon founder Jeff Bezos, cites anonymous sources who said negotiations between Amazon and Trump-appointed USPS Postmaster General David Steiner have reportedly […]...

item.title: Smartphones, PC : la flambée des prix va durer « 18 à 36 mois », le pire est à venir
item.description: Mauvaise nouvelle si vous comptiez renouveler votre équipement. La hausse des prix de la mémoire et du stockage ne fait que commencer et le pic inflationniste n'est attendu que pour l'été 2026. Une crise qui pourrait s'installer durablement, selon les prévisions des experts du secteur.

item.title: A Bronze Statue of RoboCop Finally Stands Tall in Detroit
item.description: It took the better part of two decades, but a monument to the 1987 Paul Verhoeven classic is now on display.

item.title: California’s ban on self-driving trucks could soon be over
item.description: Revised rules in California would allow self-driving trucks to test on public highways. The rules also close a loophole allowing police to issue tickets for driverless vehicles.

item.title: Ralph Lauren reveals Team USA’s uniforms for 2026 Winter Olympics
item.description: A Team USA collection, which will be given to athletes as Olympic village wear, is also now available to the public. Ralph Lauren revealed Team USA’s Milan Cortina Winter Olympics looks Thursday, complete with Americana knit sweaters and plenty of vintage call-backs.The formal opening ceremony look pairs a patterned red, white and blue knit sweater with tailored cream trousers and a matching wool coat. Moving sportier, the closing ceremony outfit features a graphic puffer coat inspired by vintage ski kits over a color-blocked sweater.“We are creating something that we know has to become timele...

item.title: Hallmark choosing to cancel The Way Home after season 4 is the right call – asking Netflix for season 5 is a waste of time
item.description: The Way Home season 4 drops in 2026, and it will be the final ever season. Instead of asking Netflix to make more, we should enjoy what we have.

item.title: « J’ai trouvé ça complètement fou » : on a lâché un novice dans une Tesla à Los Angeles, heureusement que le FSD était actif
item.description: On a envoyé un Vendéen sur les autoroutes de Los Angeles, en plein chaos urbain. Un novice dans un Tesla Cybertruck ? Oui, c'est possible, et tout s'est bien passé, grâce à la fonction la plus révolutionnaire des Tesla : le FSD. Récit d'un moment hors du commun.

item.title: A New Anonymous Phone Carrier Lets You Sign Up With Nothing but a Zip Code
item.description: Privacy stalwart Nicholas Merrill spent a decade fighting an FBI surveillance order. Now he wants to sell you phone service—without knowing almost anything about you.

item.title: Amazon’s new color Kindle Scribe launches on December 10th
item.description: Amazon has finally given a release date for its new Kindle Scribe Colorsoft and Kindle Scribe: They’ll be available to purchase starting on December 10th, Amazon spokesperson Rachel Erickson tells The Verge. They’ll cost the same as what Amazon announced back in September: $629.99 for the Colorsoft and $499.99 for the Scribe, which includes a […]

item.title: Why Day One Ventures’ Masha Bucher thinks VCs and storytelling go hand-in-hand
item.description: Day One Ventures' Masha Bucher doesn't just invest in startups—she tells their stories. Her integrated model aligns incentives and proves conviction matters more than contracts.

item.title: Meta centralizes Facebook and Instagram support, tests AI support assistant
item.description: The new support hub will connect users to security tools, account recovery options, and an AI assistant.

item.title: OpenAI must adapt to a world where it’s no longer invincible
item.description: Without the best models and chatbot, does the startup’s core proposition still work? Welcome to AI Decoded, Fast Company’s weekly newsletter that breaks down the most important news in the world of AI. I’m Mark Sullivan, a senior writer at Fast Company, covering emerging tech, AI, and tech policy.

item.title: ByteDance and DeepSeek Are Placing Very Different AI Bets
item.description: The diverging path of China’s two leading AI players shows where the country’s artificial intelligence industry is headed.

item.title: This Might Be the Biggest Thing in the Universe That Spins
item.description: Space is packed with all sorts of weird and unexpected stuff, but this humongous, spinning string-thing raises a whole new set of questions.

item.title: En 2026, Meta continuerait de tailler dans son budget métavers
item.description: Meta s’apprêterait à tailler à nouveau dans le rêve du métavers. Le groupe prévoirait jusqu’à 30 % de coupes budgétaires supplémentaires en 2026, avec de nouveaux licenciements potentiels dès janvier.

item.title: This stunning landscape photo was shot with a five-year-old Canon camera, and it just won top prize at major photo contest
item.description: The International Landscape Photographer of The Year 2025 contest winners have been announced, and the winning image was taken with a popular pro Canon camera

item.title: L’iPhone Air s’effondre sur le marché de l’occasion
item.description: C'est pas la joie pour l'iPhone Air, suite. Le smartphone ultra-fin ne rencontrerait pas les ferveurs des consommateurs, et ce manque d'appétit pour le smartphone se lit aussi sur le marché de l'occasion. La cote de l'appareil a en effet rapidement chuté.

item.title: Gizmodo Consumer Tech Editor Raymond Wong’s 8 Most Underrated Tech Gifts
item.description: Nothing too crazy, just some humble and reasonable items that I've gotten a lot of value from.

item.title: Amazon UK launches a big end-of-year sale – I've picked the top 13 tech deals and cheap last-minute gift ideas
item.description: Amazon UK has launched a big end-of-year sale, featuring some Black Friday-level price cuts on lots of top tech, home essentials, and last-minute gift ideas.

item.title: Kim Kardashian has mastered getting your attention. Now she’s teaching a class on building a billion-dollar empire from it
item.description: The reality TV icon’s new MasterClass, launching today, promises students the skills to ‘create marketing that commands attention.’ From reality TV to fashion and beauty and everywhere in between, you’ve unmistakably heard of Kim Kardashian. Critics may talk, but there’s no denying she’s one of the most influential and accomplished women of our time—with a net worth of $1.7 billion. And she’s still expanding....

item.title: The PC component crisis just got worse, as major RAM maker gives up on consumers and CPU price hikes are rumored
item.description: Want more pessimistic predictions of future component pricing? We're not short of those right now, sadly.

item.title: Chauffe, bruit, performances : que vaut la Geforce RTX 5070 Ti de Zotac sur les plus gros jeux du moment ? [Sponso]
item.description: Connaissez-vous Zotac ? Bien connue dans le petit monde du hardware PC gaming, cette marque asiatique est spécialisée dans la conception de cartes graphiques Nvidia. Une activité dans laquelle elle excelle, comme en témoignent nos tests de performances réalisés sur sa RTX 5070 Ti Solid SFF.

item.title: Spotify wants to be the next big video service
item.description: This is Lowpass by Janko Roettgers, a newsletter on the ever-evolving intersection of tech and entertainment, syndicated just for The Verge subscribers once a week. Get ready for a lot more video content on Spotify. Sometime later this month, the service will start incorporating music videos into its app, and give US-based subscribers the ability […]...

item.title: Amazon reportedly considering dropping USPS and building a competing postal service
item.description: Amazon is the USPS' biggest customer, and the e-commerce giant's potential break from the postal agency comes as the two sides are negotiating a new deal.

item.title: TikTok rolls out a ‘Nearby Feed’ to display local content in select countries
item.description: While TikTok is already known for its recommendation algorithm, which is able to target users with highly personalized content, the addition of a Nearby Feed gives it the ability to display even more relevant content to its users.

item.title: YouTube to lock out under-16s in Australia as controversial social media ban looms
item.description: YouTube has confirmed it will comply with Australia's strict new age verification laws, following the likes of Meta and X. Yet, critics are raising alarms over privacy and data security.

item.title: Adidas scores court victory in San Francisco over failed Ye partnership
item.description: U.S. shareholders claimed Adidas concealed Ye’s antisemitic behavior, but a San Francisco court blocked the appeal. Adidas defeated an appeal on Wednesday by U.S. shareholders who said the footwear and apparel maker fraudulently concealed antisemitic and other improper behavior by Ye, formerly known as Kanye West, before its partnership with the rapper and fashion designer imploded in 2022....

item.title: #FrandroidOffreMoi une imprimante photo Canon Selphy QX20
item.description: Pour le quatrième jour du concours #FrandroidOffreMoi du calendrier de l'Avent, nous vous faisons gagner une imprimante Canon Selphy QX20. Voici comment participer !

item.title: Meta reportedly plans to slash Metaverse budget by up to 30%
item.description: The proposal reflects the overall lack of interest in products like Meta's social virtual reality platform, Horizon Worlds.

item.title: Envie d’un son Dolby Atmos ? Cette barre de son Samsung vous l’offre pour moins de 250 € grâce à cette offre
item.description: Pour donner un peu de relief à vos films et séries, rien ne vaut un vrai traitement Dolby Atmos. C’est exactement la promesse de la Samsung HW-Q610F/XE. Lancée à 499 euros, la barre de son tombe à 248 euros grâce à une réduction et une ODR de 100 euros chez Electro Depot.

item.title: You’ll Never Guess What Took First Place at the Royal Society’s Photo Competition
item.description: Astronomers, ecologists, and other scientists from around the world submitted mind-bending images representing their fields.

item.title: L’UE veut rattraper son retard dans l’IA en lançant ses propres gigafactories
item.description: En matière d'IA, l'Union européenne est à la traine derrière les États-Unis et la Chine. Une place peu enviable dans la course folle au progrès, que la Commission européenne veut dépasser avec le lancement d'un appel d'offres. L'objectif est de créer des giga-usines pour entraîner les modèles IA les plus puissants.

item.title: This 5 Minute Short Is the Best ‘Doctor Who’ Episode of the Year
item.description: Peter Davison and Janet Fielding return for the latest short celebrating classic 'Doctor Who' on Blu-ray.

item.title: AI chatbots can be wooed into crimes with poetry
item.description: It turns out my parents were wrong. Saying "please" doesn't get you what you want-poetry does. At least, it does if you're talking to an AI chatbot. That's according to a new study from Italy's Icaro Lab, an AI evaluation and safety initiative from researchers at Rome's Sapienza University and AI company DexAI. The findings […]

item.title: OnePlus 15 launches US preorders after delayed FCC clearance
item.description: OnePlus has launched its delayed US preorders for the flagship OnePlus 15, almost a month after the phone was revealed. The company has been able to start taking orders after receiving FCC clearance for the device — initially held back because of the government shutdown. The OnePlus 15 starts from $899.99 for 12GB of RAM and […]

item.title: Boost your AirTag’s battery life to five years with this waterproof case
item.description: Elevation Lab has announced a smaller version of its TimeCapsule battery-boosting case for the Apple AirTag. It’s about half the size of the original and uses a pair of smaller AAA batteries instead of AAs so the AirTag’s battery life is extended to five years instead of 10. It’s available now through the company’s website […]

item.title: You’re reading this story thanks to decades of space exploration—but that’s exactly why policies need to change
item.description: Some of the biggest challenges in space include traffic management and debris mitigation, experts said at the recent World Changing Ideas Summit. There’s a very common question asked of people working in space exploration: Why explore space when we have so many problems on Earth?

item.title: How to watch Cowboys vs. Lions in the NFL online for free
item.description: How to watch NFL for free. Live stream Cowboys vs. Lions in the NFL 2025 for free from anywhere in the world.

item.title: Microsoft denies reports of lower AI sales targets as customers resist new tools
item.description: Microsoft says it hasn’t lowered AI sales targets, and Azure revenue is up 40% year-over-year.

item.title: The Magic: The Gathering Avatar The Last Airbender Play Booster Box has never been cheaper at Amazon — save over $60
item.description: The Magic: The Gathering Avatar The Last Airbender Play Booster Box is on sale for $142.57 on Amazon. That's the lowest-ever price.

item.title: Surprised by Spotify Wrapped 2025's new Listening Age feature? You’re not alone – here’s how yours compares
item.description: Listening Age divided music fans during Spotify Wrapped 2025 - this is how Spotify actually measures it

item.title: Enfin ! Google copie la meilleure fonction de l’Apple Watch pour ses Pixel Watch
item.description: Surprise ! Google prépare la prise en charge de deux nouveaux gestes sur ses montres connectées Pixel Watch.

item.title: Crypto et fuite de données : une arnaque redoutable vise les utilisateurs Ledger en France
item.description: Les utilisateurs d'un Ledger sont dans le viseur des escrocs. Dans l'espoir de voler des cryptomonnaies, les pirates ont recoupé des informations personnelles à travers plusieurs fuites de données.

item.title: Sony announces partnership with Bad Robot Games to produce and publish a new four-player, co-op shooter from Left 4 Dead director
item.description: Sony Interactive Entertainment has announced that it will produce and publish Bad Robot Games' next working title as part of a new partnership.

item.title: The Apple Watch SE 3 is still at its Cyber Monday low
item.description: The Apple Watch SE 3 was one of the best smartwatches we tested in 2025, and you can still pick up the 40mm GPS model for its Cyber Monday price of $199 ($50 off) at Amazon and Walmart. The 44mm GPS model is also matching its all-time low of $229.99 ($50 off) at Amazon and […]

item.title: Meta could ax up to one-third of its ‘metaverse’ budget next year
item.description: Meta may slash its budget for metaverse projects by up to 30 percent next year, according to a report from Bloomberg. Sources tell the outlet the potential cuts haven’t been finalized, but they would impact the unit that works on Meta’s Quest virtual reality headsets, along with its social platform Horizon Worlds. Meta, which changed […]

item.title: La fin du règne ? Pourquoi la franchise Call of Duty est « en déclin » selon les experts
item.description: Le dernier opus de la franchise Call of Duty ne passionne pas les foules. Plusieurs facteurs expliqueraient ce constat.

item.title: Test de l’iPad Pro M5 : désolé la concurrence, le roi est intouchable
item.description: L'iPad Pro passe à la puce M5.Mais une question subsiste, toujours la même : à quoi sert toute cette puissance si iPadOS nous empêche toujours de l'utiliser comme un vrai ordinateur ? J'ai passé trois semaines avec ce monstre pour le savoir.

item.title: The Magic: The Gathering Spider-Man Play Booster Box is down to its lowest-ever price at Amazon — save over $80
item.description: The Magic: The Gathering Marvel's Spider-Man Play Booster Box is on sale for $123.99 on Amazon. That's the lowest-ever price.

item.title: Spotify says Wrapped 2025 is its biggest yet, with 200M+ users in its first day
item.description: After last year's flop, Spotify Wrapped engagement is up 19% and shares were up 41%, the company says.
